item.title: Yukikaze
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Yukikaze is a Sifi movie about human fighting aliens called Jam. Learn more about this movie here Here is my project of recreating aircraft from SAS of this movie to test and improve my 3D modeling skill. FFR-31-MR Super sylph from episode FFX-99/FFR-41-MR Mave FEP-1 EWAC/ACC Learn more about this movie here
item.content:encoded:
Yukikaze is a Sifi movie about human fighting aliens called Jam. Learn more about this movie here

Here is my project of recreating aircraft from SAS of this movie to test and improve my 3D modeling skill.

  • FFR-31-MR Super sylph from episode
  • FFX-99/FFR-41-MR Mave
  • FEP-1 EWAC/ACC

Learn more about this movie here

item.title: WordPress5.8 on GitHub
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Currently this website is hosting on GitHub for free, because GitHub is an opensource platform. Learn more about Git hub here Notice: The website is a static website and not a dynamic website, this can be use for experimental and to test out WordPress without spending money. Not recommended for Business or online store. Below… Read More »WordPress5.8 on GitHub
item.content:encoded:
Currently this website is hosting on GitHub for free, because GitHub is an opensource platform. Learn more about Git hub here

Notice: The website is a static website and not a dynamic website, this can be use for experimental and to test out WordPress without spending money. Not recommended for Business or online store.

Below is the not so easy way for creating your own website without coding=>

Step1: Install WordPress 5.8 on your local machine (offline). Here is the link for the download, and I recommend you to watch the tutorial first before doing the installation because it will help you understand the process, and here is the link of tutorial.

Notice: Please save the Username and Password.

Step2: Install Simply Static on you WordPress site, this plugin allow you to generate and download static HTML file for your website don’t worry no coding involve here, you don’t need to learn HTML. Here is how you install it=>

  • First go to WordPress
  • Next type login behind wordpress/
  • Login with Username and Password
  • Hover over Plugin and click Add New
  • Search for Simply Static, install and activate it
  • Hover over Simply Static Click Setting, Under general uncheck everything except these 2 and click on SAVE CHANGES
  • Finally go to Simply Static click Generate Static Files, wait for loading, click on Click here to download

Notice: Internet connection is required for the download and don’t forget to extract the file

Step3: Hosting, you need GitHub account and you can create it for free and here is how you do it. After login to your account, create a Repository=>

  • Click on GitHub logo and click New
  • Fill the Information, check Public, check Add a README file, click Create repository

Notice: Public is important

Step4A: Install GitHub desktop and pair it with your GitHub account, Here is how it work. Next clone the repository to your local machine, where we can upload your Static HTML file and then push (upload) it to your GitHub account. Below is how you push (upload)=>

  • Open GitHib desktop and click on Show in Explorer
  • Copy all the Static file and paste it here
  • Fill in information before Commit to main
  • Click on Push origin and wait until complete and everything is done

Step4B: Install GitHub desktop and pair it with your GitHub account, Here is how it work. Next create local repository, where you can upload your Static file and then push (upload) it to your GitHub account. Below is how you create local repository=>

Notice: If you go with Step4B then you can skip Step3.

  • Click on down arrow, hover over Add and click on Create new repository
  • Fill in information check README and click Create repository
  • Click on Publish repository and wait until complete

Here how is you push (upload)=>

  • Open GitHib desktop and click on Show in Explorer
  • Copy all the Static file and paste it here
  • Fill in information before Commit to main
  • Click on Push origin and wait until complete and everything is done

Step5/Final step: after push (upload) static file is complete, go the GitHub repository to change some setting required for hosting a web site=>

  • Go to repository and click on setting
  • go down to GitHib Pages and click on Click it out here
  • Click on None and choose main
  • Click on Save and wait
  • When the link turn green it’s ready

Notice: When the link is green click on it to see if it work, you don’t need custom domain (you can buy one if you need it).

Learn more about Git hub here

item.title: Gimp
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Gimp are image editor program with similar capability to Photoshop. The different between them is that Photoshop is premium and Gimp is Free, and also Photoshop is more reliable the Gimp. The interface of the Photoshop are clean looking while Gimp interface is more customizable and less refine. the functionality are mostly similar but how… Read More »Gimp
item.content:encoded: Gimp are image editor program with similar capability to Photoshop. The different between them is that Photoshop is premium and Gimp is Free, and also Photoshop is more reliable the Gimp. The interface of the Photoshop are clean looking while Gimp interface is more customizable and less refine. the functionality are mostly similar but how they work is a complete different story. Learn more about gimp here

item.title: WordPress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: WordPress is also a web site builder but the way it work is completely different form HTML and CSS. WordPress is just like MS office program but for creating web site and it is beginner friendly since you do have to learn HTML or CSS just to create a simple web page, you just drack… Read More »WordPress
item.content:encoded: WordPress is also a web site builder but the way it work is completely different form HTML and CSS. WordPress is just like MS office program but for creating web site and it is beginner friendly since you do have to learn HTML or CSS just to create a simple web page, you just drack and drop write some something down and done. But you still need to buy a domain and hosting before you can start with WordPress, there are also a way to install WP offline on local host machine that allow you to get start without domain and hosting but you need to find the way to get it online. Learn more about WordPress here

item.title: HTML & CSS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: HTML Html is a language for building web site, basically it is the back bone of the web site without it the web simply wont work. The way HTML work is just like a lose sandwich if you start with a bread you need to stop with a bread too. Html tag can be combine… Read More »HTML & CSS
item.content:encoded:
HTML

Html is a language for building web site, basically it is the back bone of the web site without it the web simply wont work. The way HTML work is just like a lose sandwich if you start with a bread you need to stop with a bread too. Html tag can be combine together to create something, and the way tag work to together is by working under each other. Learn more about HTML here, Below is the list of HTML tags:

CSS

CSS is similar to HTML they both are use in web site, however CSS is like the outside skin over the HTML. CSS are use as a style for the Web page while HTML provide the text and functionality, CSS provide the color, style, positioning, and the effect for the webpage. CSS work as you look on a element target a part of the HTML and then you use the code to change the target to be what ever you want. Learn more about CSS here

item.title: Blender Animation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: I was getting start with animation to but my pc can only render low resolution video so I just stick with basic and very simple animation for now. Learn more about Blender here, Below is a test project of M829-APFSDS fire from L44-120mm.
item.content:encoded: I was getting start with animation to but my pc can only render low resolution video so I just stick with basic and very simple animation for now. Learn more about Blender here, Below is a test project of M829-APFSDS fire from L44-120mm.

item.title: Blender Sculpturing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: For sculpturing is basically 3D drawing a spear in to organic or any life form that are generally smooth. and again this time I lack in gear so I can’t achieve a good result on sculpture yet. But I have working on a model using mouse, it is possible but I still need more practice.… Read More »Blender Sculpturing
item.content:encoded: For sculpturing is basically 3D drawing a spear in to organic or any life form that are generally smooth. and again this time I lack in gear so I can’t achieve a good result on sculpture yet. But I have working on a model using mouse, it is possible but I still need more practice. Learn more about Blender here

item.title: Blender 3D Modeling
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: For blender I’m currently using blender 2.93.1 and I can turn a cube to any object as long as I can imagine it shape and size or using a blueprint to turn a 2D image in to a complete 3D object. Below is my progress in 3D modeling:
item.content:encoded: For blender I’m currently using blender 2.93.1 and I can turn a cube to any object as long as I can imagine it shape and size or using a blueprint to turn a 2D image in to a complete 3D object. Below is my progress in 3D modeling:
